text: Now when Paul realized that some were 23:6 Sadducees and others were Pharisees ¦ Pharisees and others were Sadducees PCKSadducees and others were Pharisees, he cried out in the Sanhedrin, “Brothers, I am a Pharisee, 23:6 the son of a Pharisee ¦ a son of Pharisees CTthe son of a Pharisee. It is regarding the hope of the resurrection of the dead that I am on trial.”
